response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your highest standards. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, but considering its importance to you, we're confident it will serve you well. We're offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $9,500, aiming to provide you with a unique opportunity to own something truly special. We believe this is a fair and attractive offer that respects both the value of the product and your budget. We look forward to hearing your response.", "product_price": 9500}
